h1_title: Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough
content: When the boat ride is over, you'll be at the Birthstone portion of the Water Curtain Cave. In the distance, you'll see a monkey sitting cross-legged in the water.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Water_Curtain_Cave_and_Birthstone_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Birthstone - Heart of Birthstone'.
The content is as follows:
When the boat ride is over, you'll be at the Birthstone portion of the Water Curtain Cave. In the distance, you'll see a monkey sitting cross-legged in the water.
